==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=七宝}}

===Etymology===
Translation of {{der|zh|sa|सप्तरत्न}}. The seven treasures refers to the seven gems and precious metals, referenced in the Buddhist [[w:Prajñā|Prajñā]] [[sutra]]s and others.
